text: Abaleevi6:15 Besusemesi kyali kibuga ky’Abaleevi (Yos 21:16). Abaleevi bokka be baali bakkirizibwa okutambuza Essanduuko ya Mukama (Ma 10:8) ne batwala essanduuko ya Mukama, n’ekisanduuko ekyalimu ebibumbe ebya zaabu, ne babiteeka ku jjinja eddene. Awo ku lunaku olwo abantu b’e Besusemesi ne bawaayo ebiweebwayo ebyokebwa ne ssaddaaka eri Mukama.
